thread.title: Patagonia Launches New Down Sleeping Bag 45 Years in the Making
thread.title_full: Patagonia Launches New Down Sleeping Bag 45 Years in the Making

author: Marcus Cho
title: Patagonia Launches New Down Sleeping Bag 45 Years in the Making
text:
Patagonia has unveiled the 850 Down Sleeping Bag – an elegant, real-world bag, built with the best materials available and Patagonia’s 45 years of down-construction expertise.
As always with Patagonia, materials for the bag are only sourced from ethical places – its 850-fill-power Traceable Down is traced from parent farm to apparel factory to help ensure the birds that supply it are not force-fed or live-plucked. Externally, the bag is graced by an ultralight 100% nylon ripstop Pertex Quantum fabric to create a shell half the weight and twice the strength of Patagonia’s other down shell fabrics.
Other fit elements such as a low-profile hood, Houdini fabric liner, and custom food bed also serve to ensure maximum comfort internally.
The Patagonia 850 Down sleeping bag is now available online at Patagonia’s official site .
